text: (upbeat music)
- Hi, I am Surojit Guha, Program Manager

with Sony India Software
Centre Private Limited.

Thank you for having me here
and giving me this platform
to share this exciting anecdote.

I'm thrilled to share how
we enhanced efficiency

and empowered 7,000 SAP users
across Sony's vast platform

by implementing a chatbot for
send service password resets
and account unlocks.
Our goal was to optimize user management
and reduce operational cost.
Integrating the Microsoft Teams app
with our AWS landscape was challenging.

We worked closely with
AWS Enterprise Support
and technical account managers
for evaluating application architecture
and sharing optimal approaches

for integrating Amazon
API Gateway with API Keys.

This ensured a smooth connection
between the Azure platform
and AWS application.

This project shows how
strategic partnership

and AWS technologies can optimize
business critical systems.
I'm proud of what our team has achieved

and the positive impacts
on productivity and cost.
Most importantly, by putting the tools
directly into the hands of our users,
we have given them back time
to focus on Sony's core mission.
Thank you.
(upbeat music)
